500 Parasols 五百遮阳伞 Pinyin 500 Parasols 五百遮阳伞 500 五百 parasols 遮阳伞 五百 500 遮阳伞 parasols Once upon a time, there was a very wise and compassionate man. 很久以前，有一个非常聪明、富有同情心的人。 once upon a time 很久以前 there was a 有一个 very 非常 wise 聪明 and 和 compassionate 富有同情心的 man 人 很久以前 once upon a time 有一个 there was a 非常 very 聪明 wise 富有同情心的 compassionate 人 man Many people came to the wise man because he helped them understand difficult things about life. 这个人能帮助人们理解生活中困难的事情，大家都来找他帮忙。 many people 许多人 came to 来找 the wise man 智者 because 因为 he 他 helped 帮助了 them 他们 understand 理解 difficult things about life 生活中困难的事情 这个人 this person 能 can 帮助 help 人们 people 理解 understand 生活中困难的事情 difficult things about life 大家 everyone 都 all 来找 come to 他 him 帮忙 help They came to him because of his great love for all people. 也因为这个人的大爱包容, 大家都喜欢找他帮忙。 they 他们 came to 来找 him 他 because of 因为 his 他的 great love 大爱 for 对 all people 所有人 也因为 also because 这个人的 this person's 大爱包容 great love and tolerance 大家 everyone 都 all 喜欢 like 找 come to 他 him 帮忙 help One day, some children decided to visit this great man. 有一天，小朋友们决定去拜访这位智者。 one day 有一天 some 一些 children 小朋友们 decided 决定 to visit 去拜访 this 这位 great man 伟大的人 有一天 one day 小朋友们 the children 决定 decided 去拜访 to visit 这位 this 智者 wise man The children wanted to bring the perfect gift. 小朋友们想带一份最好的礼物送给他。 the children 小朋友们 wanted 想 to bring 带 the 这 perfect 完美的 gift 礼物 小朋友们 the children 想 wanted 带 to bring 一份 a 最好的 best 礼物 gift 送给他 to give to him But they could not decide what it should be. 但他们无法决定什么才是最好的礼物。 but 但 they 他们 could not 无法 decide 决定 what it should be 它应该是什么 但 but 他们 they 无法 could not 决定 decide 什么才是 what is 最好的 the best 礼物 gift So, they sat under a parasol in the hot sun and thought. 于是，在烈日下，他们坐在遮阳伞下思考。 so 于是 they 他们 sat 坐 under a parasol 在遮阳伞下 in the hot sun 在烈日下 and 和 thought 思考 于是 so 在烈日下 in the hot sun 他们 they 坐 sat 在遮阳伞下 under a parasol 思考 thought They sat under a parasol in the cool rain and thought. 在凉雨中，他们坐在遮阳伞下思考。 they 他们 sat 坐 under a parasol 在遮阳伞下 in the cool rain 在凉雨中 and 和 thought 思考 在凉雨中 in the cool rain 他们 they 坐 sat 在遮阳伞下 under a parasol 思考 thought As they thought, more and more children joined them. Every child brought a parasol and they all thought together. 正在思考的时候，越来越多的小朋友也加入了进来。每个小朋友都带了一把遮阳伞，大家一起来思考。 as they thought 正在思考的时候 more and more 越来越多的 children 小朋友 joined 加入了 them 他们 every 每个 child 小朋友 brought 带了 a 一把 parasol 遮阳伞 and 和 they 他们 all 都 thought 思考 together 一起 正在思考的时候 as they thought 越来越多的 more and more 小朋友 children 也 also 加入了进来 joined in 每个 every 小朋友 child 都 all 带了 brought 一把 a 遮阳伞 parasol 大家 everyone 一起 together 来思考 came to think Finally, one child looked up at all the parasols and said, “Why don’t we give our parasols to the wise man?" 最后，一个小朋友抬头看了看所有的遮阳伞，说道："为什么不把我们的遮阳伞送给智者呢？” finally 最后 one 一个 child 小朋友 looked up at 抬头看了看 all the parasols 所有的遮阳伞 and 和 said 说道 why don’t we 我们为什么不 give 给 our 我们的 parasols 遮阳伞 to 给 the wise man 智者 最后 finally 一个 one 小朋友 child 抬头看了看 looked up at 所有的遮阳伞 all the parasols 说道 said 为什么不把 why not 我们的 our 遮阳伞 parasols 送给 to give to 智者 the wise man 呢 modal particle “Our parasols have protected us from the sun. Our parasols have protected us from the rain. This is our greatest gift!” “这些遮阳伞保护我们不被太阳晒，保护我们不受雨淋。这就是最好的礼物呀！" our 我们的 parasols 遮阳伞 have protected 保护 us 我们 from the sun 不被太阳晒 our 我们的 parasols 遮阳伞 have protected 保护 us 我们 from the rain 不受雨淋 this is 这就是 our 我们的 greatest 最好的 gift 礼物 这些 these 遮阳伞 parasols 保护 have protected 我们 us 不被太阳晒 from the sun 保护 have protected 我们 us 不受雨淋 from the rain 这就是 this is 最好的 the best 礼物 gift 呀 * So, all the children decided to make their parasols the most beautiful they could be. 于是，小朋友们决定把自己的遮阳伞都变得漂漂亮亮的。 so 于是 all the children 所有小朋友 decided 决定 to make 让 their 他们的 parasols 遮阳伞 the most beautiful 最漂亮的 they could be 它们可能是 于是 so 小朋友们 the children 决定 decided 把 to make 自己的 their own 遮阳伞 parasols 都 all 变得 become 漂漂亮亮 beautiful 的 particle When they were done, there were 500 children and 500 brilliant parasols. 完成后，一共有500个小朋友和500把漂亮的遮阳伞。 when they were done 完成后 there were 有 500 五百 children 小朋友 and 和 500 五百 brilliant 漂亮的 parasols 遮阳伞 完成后 when they were done 一共 altogether 有 there were 500个 500 小朋友 children 和 and 500把 500 漂亮的 beautiful 遮阳伞 parasols When the children arrived, the wise and compassionate man welcomed them and smiled. 当小朋友们去拜访智者的时候，这位聪明而富有同情心的人露出了灿烂的笑容，很欢迎大家。 when 当 the children 小朋友们 arrived 到达时 the 这位 wise 聪明 and 而 compassionate 富有同情心的 man 人 welcomed 欢迎 them 他们 and 并 smiled 微笑着 当 when 小朋友们 the children 去拜访 went to visit 智者 the wise men 的时候 at the time 这位 this 聪明 wise 而 and 富有同情心的 compassionate 人 man 露出了灿烂的笑容 showed a big smile 很欢迎 was very welcoming 大家 to everyone On the spot, he turned their beautiful gifts into one enormous, shining parasol. 他当场把这些美丽的礼物，变成了一把闪闪发光的巨大遮阳伞。 on the spot 当场 he 他 turned 变 their 他们的 beautiful 美丽的 gifts 礼物 into 成了 one 一把 enormous 巨大 shining 闪闪发光的 parasol 遮阳伞 他 he 当场 on the spot 把 preposition 这些 these 美丽的 beautiful 礼物 gifts 变成了 turned into 一把 one 闪闪发光的 shining 巨大 enormous 遮阳伞 parasol The parasol was so big, it covered the entire galaxy. 遮阳伞如此之大，覆盖了整个银河系。 the parasol 遮阳伞 was 是 so big 如此之大 it 它 covered 覆盖了 the 这 entire 整个 galaxy 银河系 遮阳伞 the parasol 如此之大 so big 覆盖了 covered 整个 entire 银河系 galaxy When they looked up, the children saw all people and all worlds reflected in that single brilliant and beautiful parasol. 当孩子们抬起头时，看到所有的人和所有的地方都映照在这把美丽绚烂的遮阳伞上。 when 当 they 他们 looked up 抬起头 the children 孩子们 saw 看到 all people 所有的人 and 和 all worlds 所有的地方 reflected 映照 in 在 that 那 single 一把 brilliant 绚烂 and 和 beautiful 美丽 parasol 遮阳伞 当 when 孩子们 the children 抬起头 looked up 时 at the time 看到 saw 所有的人 all people 和 and 所有的地方 all worlds 都 all 映照 reflected 在 in 这把 this 美丽 beautiful 绚烂 brilliant 的 of 遮阳伞 parasol 上 on What is this picture? 这张照片是什么？ deciding 决定 welcoming 欢迎 giving 送给 protecting 保护 What is this picture? 这张照片是什么？ arriving 到达 making 变得 visiting 拜访 thinking 思考 What is this picture? 这张照片是什么？ protecting 保护 visiting 拜访 thinking 思考 reflecting 映照 Click the picture. Listen to the question. 点击图片。听这个问题。 500 parasols 五百遮阳伞 all people and all worlds 所有的人和所有的地方 the wise man 智者 difficult things about life 生活中困难的事情 Complete the sentence! 完成句子！ People came to the wise man because he . 大家都来找智者帮忙，是因为 。 loved getting gifts 智者喜欢收到礼物 had beautiful parasols 智者有漂亮的遮阳伞 liked good food 智者喜欢收到礼物 helped people understand life 智者喜欢吃美食 Complete the sentence! 完成句子！ The children wanted to bring to the wise man. 小朋友们想把 送给智者。 cool rain 凉雨 their friends 朋友 the perfect gift 最好的礼物 the galaxy 银河系 Complete the sentence! 完成句子！ The wise man turned the children’s parasols into . 智者把小朋友们的遮阳伞变成了 。 a very large sun 一个大太阳 one enormous parasol 一把巨大遮阳伞 a galaxy 银河系 a perfect gift 最好的礼物 Retell the story! 重述故事！ Read out loud! 大声读出来！ The children wanted to bring the perfect gift. But they could not decide what it should be. As they thought, more and more children joined them. Finally one child looked up at all the parasols and said, "Why don't we give our parasols to the wise man?" 小朋友们想带一份最好的礼物送给他。但他们无法决定什么才是最好的礼物。 正在思考的时候，越来越多的小朋友也加入了进来。最后，一个小朋友抬头看了看所有的遮阳伞，说道："为什么不把我们的遮阳伞送给智者呢？” Record your answer. 记录你的答案。 Write a sentence about this picture. 写一句关于这张照片。 Write your answer. 写你的答案。 Why were the parasols the children’s greatest gift? 为什么小朋友们觉得遮阳伞是最好的礼物？ Write your answer. 写你的答案。 What did you like about the story? 你喜欢这个故事的什么内容？ Match the words! 匹配单词！ to decide 决定 to protect 保护 to give 送给 to think 思考 to make 变得 to visit 拜访 500 Parasols 五百遮阳伞
